data: “If you will allow me, I shall have the pleasure of reading aloud to you some passages from 'Mrs. Lirriper’s Lodgings,' by Charles Dickens.”
"If you will allow me, I shall have the pleasure of reading aloud to you some passages from 'Mrs. Lirriper's Lodgings,' by Charles Dickens."
